# maxminddb Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "maxminddb" {
  db_path = "/path/to/GeoIP2-City.mmdb"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **db_path** (String) path to mmdb file. Can be also set via `MAXMIND_DB_PATH` env variable
